title: 300 Questions to Ask Your Parents Before It's Too Late [Paperback] Shannon L. Alder
description: Ask the perfect questions and receive answers full of wisdom with this easy-to-use guide. Learn from your parents the time honored traditions and habits that have made them who they are today, including their views on spirituality, what they learned in their youth, how they feel about parenting, and much more! With over 300 questions, this guide is a sure way to help you know your parents better.
author: Shannon L. Alder
